title: Dear White People and more
itunes:title: Dear White People and more
description:
Thursday 5/3- Today on the show we had the cast of the show "Dear White People" ( Logan Browning, Antoinette Robertson, Ashley Blaine Featherson) where they spoke on the meaning of the show title, the use of the N- Word and Logan even opened up to us about something she never told out in the open before. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the man who is now charged for extorting Kevin Hart's sex tape and Angela helped some listeners during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 5/3- Today on the show we had the cast of the show "Dear White People" ( Logan Browning, Antoinette Robertson, Ashley Blaine Featherson) where they spoke on the meaning of the show title, the use of the N- Word and Logan even opened up to us about something she never told out in the open before. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the man who is now charged for extorting Kevin Hart's sex tape and Angela helped some listeners during "Ask Yee".
